salvationQuiz.title: Salvation Quiz
salvationQuiz.subtitle: Answer these questions honestly to examine your understanding of salvation according to the Bible.
salvationQuiz.question: Question
salvationQuiz.savedMessage: Based on your answers, you understand and have accepted the Biblical plan of salvation. Continue to grow in your faith through prayer, Bible study, and fellowship with other believers.
salvationQuiz.notSavedMessage: Based on your answers, you may need to examine what the Bible says about salvation. Salvation is by grace through faith in Jesus Christ alone, not by works. We encourage you to read our gospel tracts to learn more about God's plan for you.
salvationQuiz.featureBibleBasedDesc: Each question is supported by Scripture
salvationQuiz.featurePrivateDesc: Your answers are not stored anywhere
salvationQuiz.featureEducationalDesc: Learn what the Bible says about salvation
salvationQuiz.resultsVerse: "For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: Not of works, lest any man should boast."
salvationQuiz.q1: Have you ever sinned (told a lie, stolen anything, had impure thoughts)?
salvationQuiz.v1: Romans 3:23 - For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God.
salvationQuiz.q2: Do you believe that Jesus Christ is the Son of God?
salvationQuiz.v2: John 3:16 - For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son...
salvationQuiz.q3: Do you believe Jesus died on the cross for your sins?
salvationQuiz.v3: 1 Peter 2:24 - Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree.
salvationQuiz.q4: Do you believe Jesus rose from the dead?
salvationQuiz.v4: Romans 10:9 - If thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus, and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead, thou shalt be saved.
salvationQuiz.q5: Have you ever personally asked Jesus Christ to save you?
salvationQuiz.v5: Romans 10:13 - For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved.
salvationQuiz.q6: Are you trusting in your good works to get you to heaven?
salvationQuiz.v6: Ephesians 2:8-9 - For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: Not of works, lest any man should boast.
salvationQuiz.q7: Are you trusting in Jesus Christ ALONE for your salvation?
salvationQuiz.v7: Acts 4:12 - Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.
salvationQuiz.q8: If you died today, do you KNOW for certain you would go to heaven?
salvationQuiz.v8: 1 John 5:13 - These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God; that ye may KNOW that ye have eternal life.
salvationQuiz.q9: Do you believe that eternal life is a free gift from God?
salvationQuiz.v9: Romans 6:23 - For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
salvationQuiz.q10: Have you placed your complete trust in Jesus Christ as your personal Savior?
salvationQuiz.v10: John 1:12 - But as many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Dedicated to spreading the Gospel of Jesus Christ through free resources and materials.
about.missionText1: "Let the Truth be Known" is a ministry dedicated to spreading the Gospel of Jesus Christ across Africa and beyond. We believe that everyone deserves to hear the Good News in their own language.
about.missionText2: Our mission is to provide free, high-quality gospel tracts, discipleship materials, and teaching resources to churches, missionaries, and individual believers around the world.
about.missionVerse: "Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature."
about.value1Desc: All our materials are based solely on the Word of God, using clear Scripture references.
about.value2Desc: All resources are completely free to download, print, and distribute.
about.value3Desc: We translate materials into multiple African languages to reach more people.
about.value4Desc: We work with local churches and missionaries for effective gospel distribution.
about.offer1Desc: God's Simple Plan of Salvation in 9+ languages
about.offer5Desc: Additional resources for deeper Bible study
about.ctaDesc: Download our materials and start sharing the Gospel in your community today.

discipleship.title: Discipleship
discipleship.subtitle: A three-level journey through essential Christian teachings. Grow from new believer to mature disciple.
discipleship.ctaDesc: Begin with Level 1 and work through each book systematically. Each level builds on the previous one to help you grow in your faith.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our ministry and resources.
faqs.a1: Yes! All materials on this website are completely free to download, print, and distribute. We believe the Gospel should be freely shared with everyone.
faqs.q2: Can I print and distribute these tracts?
faqs.a2: Absolutely! We encourage you to print and distribute these tracts freely. They are designed to be printed and shared with others. For best results, print on both sides and fold as indicated.
faqs.a3: We currently offer materials in English, Swahili, Luo, Kikuyu, Kalenjin, Kisii, Arabic, Amharic, Maasai, and Kamba. We are continuously working on adding more languages.
faqs.q4: How do I use the Discipleship materials?
faqs.a4: The discipleship program is designed to be completed in order. Start with Level 1 (Foundations) and work through each book. Each level builds on the previous one. You can use these for personal study or to disciple new believers.
faqs.q5: Can I use these materials in my church?
faqs.a5: Yes! Churches are welcome to use all materials for evangelism, Sunday school, Bible studies, and discipleship programs. We only ask that you don't sell them.
faqs.q6: How do I take the Salvation Quiz?
faqs.a6: Simply visit our Salvation Quiz page and answer each question honestly. The quiz is based on Bible verses and will help you examine your understanding of salvation according to Scripture.
faqs.a7: The Answer Book series is a 7-volume collection that answers common questions about Christianity, including topics like soul-winning, church issues, Christian living, false doctrines, and false religions.
faqs.q8: Can I request materials in a new language?
faqs.a8: Yes! If you would like to see materials translated into a specific language, please contact us. We are always looking for opportunities to reach more people with the Gospel.
faqs.q9: How can I support this ministry?
faqs.a9: The best way to support us is by sharing these materials with others and praying for the ministry. If you'd like to help with translations or distribution, please reach out through our contact page.
faqs.q10: Are the videos on this site original content?
faqs.a10: We feature various gospel-related videos and worship content. Some are original productions, while others are curated from trusted sources to edify and encourage believers.
faqs.stillHaveQuestionsDesc: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

nextSteps.step1Tip3: Consider getting a physical Bible to highlight and mark
nextSteps.step2Desc: Begin reading God's Word daily. Start with the Gospel of John to learn about Jesus, then Romans to understand salvation.
nextSteps.step2Verse: "Study to shew thyself approved unto God, a workman that needeth not to be ashamed, rightly dividing the word of truth." ‚Äî 2 Timothy 2:15

nextSteps.step2Tip3: Keep a journal to write down what you learn

nextSteps.step3Tip2: Talk to God like you would a close friend
nextSteps.step3Tip3: Use the ACTS method: Adoration, Confession, Thanksgiving, Supplication
nextSteps.step3Tip4: Don't worry about fancy words‚ÄîGod wants your heart
nextSteps.step4Desc: Join a Bible-believing church where you can grow, learn, and fellowship with other Christians.

nextSteps.step4Tip3: Visit a few churches to find where you feel at home
nextSteps.step5Desc: Baptism is your public declaration of faith in Jesus Christ. It symbolizes your old life dying and new life beginning.
nextSteps.step5Verse: "Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death: that like as Christ was raised up from the dead, even so we also should walk in newness of life." ‚Äî Romans 6:4

nextSteps.step6Desc: Tell others what Jesus has done for you! Your testimony is powerful and can lead others to Christ.
nextSteps.step6Verse: "Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature." ‚Äî Mark 16:15
nextSteps.step6Tip1: Start by sharing with family and friends
